body:
Hello,
The most recent distribution is lacking about 80 executable files  
including ximage and pvalue (from http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/framed.html) 
. This is true for both the source download and for the linux  
precompiled download. But they are there in the Mac precompiled  
download. Any ideas where they went?


Thank you very much!
Katja
___
